item.title: Amber add a quote by pablo neruda
item.description: "La heradera del dia destruida. (The heiress of the destroyed day.)" -- pablo neruda

item.title: Amber add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "This cave within a cave, this paleolithic pussy, this decent into the deepest dark of fuck." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Amber add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "The Conch Shell´s tint was that of a vagina blowing bubble gum." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Amber add a quote by Louis Pasteur
item.description: "Chance favors the prepared mind." -- Louis Pasteur

item.title: Amber add a quote by Jacob Henle
item.description: "Nature answers only when she is questioned." -- Jacob Henle

item.title: Amber add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "There is a sense in which a painted stick is a stick in bloom. This stick points to the hidden face of God. Sometimes it points to you." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Amber add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "There is light underwater, even at night, but it is a far cry from the lights that we all know and love... the light by which the reaper reads his list." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Amber add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "Ellen Cherry was from the south and had good manners. She didn´t have any panties on, but she had good manners." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Amber add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Amber add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Amber add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Amber add a quote by Gordon A. Eadie
item.description: "If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything." -- Gordon A. Eadie

item.title: Amber add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Amber add a quote by Apple Computer Inc.
item.description: "Here's to the crazy ones. The misfits. The rebels. The troublemakers. The round pegs in the square holes. The ones who see things differently. They're not fond of rules. And they have no respect for the status quo. You can quote them, disagree with them, glorify or vilify them. About the only thing you can't do is ignore them. Because they change things. They push the human race forward. And while some may see them as the crazy ones, we see genius. Because the people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do." -- Apple Computer Inc.

item.title: Amber add a quote by E.B. White
item.description: "If the world were merely seductive, that would be easy. If it were merely challenging, that would be no problem. But I arise in the morning torn between a desire to improve the world and a desire to enjoy the world. This makes it hard to plan the day." -- E.B. White

item.title: Amber add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "I don't know the question, but sex is definitely the answer." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Amber add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Everything in the world is about sex except sex. Sex is about power." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Amber add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "Is sex dirty? Only when it's being done right." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Amber add a quote by Madonna
item.description: "Sick and perverted always appeals to me." -- Madonna
